src:
堅果海鮮湯麵 簡單美味的做法（視頻）

05 Nov 2019, 01:26

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月05日訊】堅果海鮮湯麵
材料：椒麻堅果醬1大匙、薑片、香菜1株、紅蔥頭2顆、白胡椒、鹽、魚露、草蝦6尾、中卷1隻、蛤蜊5顆、麵1把
以下YouTube視頻示範：

Nut Seafood Noodle Soup Simple and Delicious Practice (Video)

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 05, 2019] Nuts and seafood noodle soup
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon of pepper and nut butter, 1 ginger, coriander, 2 red onion, white pepper, salt, fish sauce, 6 shrimp, 1 medium roll, 5 round, 1 face
